name: Encroaching
description:
This habitat is no longer habitable. Grab your headphones and a gamepad to really throw yourself in, or your keyboard and loudspeakers in a pinch. Find out what is encroaching on these woods.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42 by Ava Skoog and Marte Kvamme Strømmen. Most sound effects from zapsplat.com. The theme was running out of space. 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/encroaching

WASD + QE or dual gamepad sticks.
